content: a loop 13″ 33 02 cm long use a measuring tape to be consistent insert your index finger into the loop and twist loop 25 times note it does not matter which direction just be consistent using the crochet hook slip_stitch in same st allowing twisted loop to coil around itself single_crochet in next 2 stitches repeat from* across the bottom of the shawl and fasten off repeat this process on the other end if you prefer to see this technique done the crochet crowd has a good video their technique is similar to mine except they are slip stitching into the next stitch and i single crocheted video link https //youtu be/kiyevup3i5s 2 ©2020 by mary riley hunt all rights reserved - sales of finished shawl is allowed
